messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections.

messages.title: HAVE A CLEAR CHOICE
messages.content: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.

messages.title: THIS ELECTION IS YOUR CHANCE TO BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE
